mapper.update: merge into wish w using (select goods_num from goods where goods_num = #{goodsNum}) g on (w.goods_num = g.goods_num) When MATCHED THEN update set WISH_DATE = sysdate delete where member_num = #{memberNum} and goods_num =#{goodsNum} When not MATCHED THEN insert (MEMBER_NUM, GOODS_NUM, WISH_DATE) values (#{memberNum} , g.goods_num ,sysdate )
mapper.select: select count(*) from wish where member_num = #{memberNum} and goods_num =#{goodsNum}
